path: artifacts/Incubate Smart Contract Audit Report - QuillAudits.pdf

project_path.Incubate: contracts/Incubate Smart Contract Audit Report - QuillAudits/Incubate

findings.title: Block timestamp
findings.description: Do not rely on block.timestamp, now and blockhash as a source of randomness, unless you know what you are doing.
findings.location: Contract, function unlockCurentTokens (Line 1054-1067), function stackToken (Line 1079-1113), function unStakeToken (Line 1120-1140)

findings.title: State variables that could be declared constant
findings.description: Constant state variables should be declared constant to save gas.

findings.title: Conformance to Solidity naming conventions
findings.description: A misunderstanding function name could influence code readability, in some cases, may lead to bugs in the future.
